sources.title: Earthstorm | Free Action Sci-Fi Disaster Movie | Full Free Movie | Stephen Baldwin
sources.description:
Earthstorm | Free Action Sci-Fi Disaster Movie | Full Free Movie | Stephen Baldwin

An asteroid hits the Moon, causing fissures in its crust and sends a chunk hurtling toward Earth. Even worse is the threat that larger pieces will break off which could obliterate whole cities on impact! With the Moon out of sync, strange weather and huge tidal waves are threatening the population. Scientists conclude the only solution is to set nuclear charges on the Moon to implode it and keep it whole. The man for the job is demolitions expert, John Redding. Can he succeed in placing the charges correctly before an even larger piece threatens civilization?

2006.  Stars: Stephen Baldwin, Amy Price-Francis, John Ralston
*Licensed from Vision Films. All rights reserved*

*Review* - "Earthstorm" (2006) is an action-packed sci-fi disaster movie full of explosive action, apocalyptic danger, and heroic excess. When a massive asteroid strikes the Moon, it breaks apart, showering deadly debris on Earth and endangering total planetary destruction. As tidal waves build, the weather turns volatile, and the planet teeters in the balance, a desperate solution is hatchedâ€”explode nuclear bombs on the Moon to keep it from disintegrating. Enter John Redding (Stephen Baldwin), a demolition expert somehow better prepared than all of NASA's group of specialists. Defying incredible odds, he embarks on the formidable challenge of saving the world from lunar destruction. With frenetic action, cheeseball dialogue, and old-fashioned made-for-TV disaster spectacularism, Earthstorm is a thrilling ride for any doomsday film fan, and asteroid apocalypse movie fan.

metadata.Plot: A massive asteroid impact on the moon begins causing storms on earth due to the sudden changes in ocean tides. But when further examination is conducted it's discovered that the moon's structure is now entirely unstable -- threatening all life on earth. With time running out, a team of scientists turn to one man, demolitions expert John Redding, in effort to find a solution and secure the moon.
metadata.Actors: Stephen Baldwin, Amy Price-Francis, John Ralston
